name: Weird Photography Game
description:
Just playing around with an idea.

Press Ctrl in-game to take picture. You won't be able to look at the picture, but it will affect things in-game. I suggest talking to every NPC before taking any pictures.

Press Shift in-game to view how many frames you have left, as well as how many subjects were detected in the last photo you took.

The background tiles are all created by me, but the sprites are blatantly stolen from the example game.
